svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Weekly hours worked by children (7-14) vs GDP per capita (PPP), 2015
The vertical axis shows average weekly working hours for children ages 7-14 who are involved in an economic
activity for at least one hour in the reference week of the corresponding survey (irrespective of school attendance).
The horizontal axis shows GDP per capita after adjusting for differences in prices across countries and inflation
Average working hours of children, study and work, ages 7-14 (hours
